location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Ext 115/42 Application of an Abyssinian for assistance in returning from Kuwait to Abyssinia

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the front to the rear of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence commences at the front cover with 1 and terminates at the inside back cover with 4; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file consists of two telegrams exchanged between the Foreign Office and the Political Residency at Bushire, regarding the application of an Abyssinian for assistance to return from Kuwait to Abyssinia.
